1. Click on the 'Record Screen' button b: 1. Klik tombol 'Rekam Layar' ing ngisor iki kanggo miwiti ngrekam masalah sing sampeyan alami.
2. Once you have finished recording the: 2. Yen wis rampung ngrekam masalah, klik tombol 'Manden Ngrekam' (tombol sing padha, nanging labelé ganti gumantung apa sampeyan lagi aktif ngrekam utawa ora).
4. Complete the provided issue template,: 4. Rampungake cithakan masalah sing disedhiyakake, pesthekake nyakup rincian sing dibutuhake, lan gunakake bagean aset kanggo ngunggah file rekaman saka langkah sadurunge.
A simple, high-quality voice conversion: Piranti konversi swara prasaja lan kualitas dhuwur sing fokus ing gampang digunakake lan kinerja.
Adding several silent files to the train: Nambahake sawetara file meneng menyang set latihan ngidini model nangani kasepen murni ing file audio sing disimpulake. Pilih 0 yen set data sampeyan resik lan wis ngemot bagean kasepen murni.
Adjust the input audio pitch to match th: Setel nada audio input supaya cocog karo rentang model swara.
Adjusting the position more towards one: Nyetel posisi luwih menyang siji sisih utawa liyane bakal nggawe model luwih mirip karo sing pertama utawa kaloro.
Adjusts the final volume of the converte: Nyetel volume pungkasan swara sing diowahi sawise diproses.
Adjusts the input volume before processi: Nyetel volume input sadurunge diproses. Nyegah clipping utawa nambahake mic sing sepi.
Adjusts the volume of the monitor feed,: Nyetel volume feed monitor, ora gumantung karo output utama.
Amount of extra audio processed to provi: Jumlah audio tambahan sing diproses kanggo menehi konteks marang model. Ngapikake kualitas konversi kanthi biaya panggunaan CPU sing luwih dhuwur.
Apply a soft autotune to your inferences: Terapake autotune alus ing inferensi sampeyan, disaranake kanggo konversi nyanyi.
Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Lower: Ukuran buffer audio ing milidetik. Nilai sing luwih cilik bisa nyuda latensi nanging nambah beban CPU.
Audio file slicing method: Select 'Skip': Cara ngiris file audio: Pilih 'Liwati' yen file wis diiris, 'Prasaja' yen kasepen sing kakehan wis dibusak saka file, utawa 'Otomatis' kanggo deteksi kasepen otomatis lan ngiris ing sakubenge.
Audio normalization: Select 'none' if th: Normalisasi audio: Pilih 'ora ana' yen file wis dinormalisasi, 'pra' kanggo normalisasi kabeh file input bebarengan, utawa 'pasca' kanggo normalisasi saben irisan kanthi individu.
Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed: Cache set data ing memori GPU kanggo nyepetake proses latihan.
Check which version of Applio is the lat: Priksa versi Applio sing paling anyar kanggo ndeleng apa sampeyan kudu nganyari.
Choose the model architecture:\n- **RVC:
Pilih arsitektur model:
- **RVC (V2)**: Pilihan gawan, kompatibel karo kabeh klien.
- **Applio**: Kualitas canggih kanthi vocoder sing luwih apik lan tingkat sampel sing luwih dhuwur, mung kanggo Applio.
Choose the vocoder for audio synthesis:\:
Pilih vocoder kanggo sintesis audio:
- **HiFi-GAN**: Pilihan gawan, kompatibel karo kabeh klien.
- **MRF HiFi-GAN**: Kasetyan sing luwih dhuwur, mung kanggo Applio.
- **RefineGAN**: Kualitas audio sing unggul, mung kanggo Applio.
Clean your audio output using noise dete: Resikake output audio sampeyan nggunakake algoritma deteksi swara, disaranake kanggo audio wicara.
Clear Outputs (Deletes all audios in ass: Resikake Output (Mbusak kabeh audio ing aset/audio)
Click the refresh button to see the pret: Klik tombol refresh kanggo ndeleng file sing wis dilatih ing menu gulung mudhun.
Detect overtraining to prevent the model: Deteksi overtraining kanggo nyegah model sinau data latihan kanthi apik banget lan kelangan kemampuan kanggo generalisasi menyang data anyar.
Determine at how many epochs the model w: Temtokake ing pirang-pirang epoch model bakal disimpen.
Drag and drop your model here: Seret lan selehna model sampeyan ing kene
Drag your .pth file and .index file into: Seret file .pth lan file .index sampeyan menyang papan iki. Seret siji banjur liyane.
Duration of the fade between audio chunk: Durasi fade antarane potongan audio kanggo nyegah klik. Nilai sing luwih dhuwur nggawe transisi luwih alus nanging bisa nambah latensi.
Enable Applio integration with Discord p: Aktifake integrasi Applio karo kehadiran Discord
Enable formant shifting. Used for male t: Aktifake pergeseran forman. Digunakake kanggo konversi lanang menyang wadon lan kosok balene.
Enable this setting only if you are trai: Aktifake setelan iki mung yen sampeyan nglatih model anyar saka awal utawa miwiti maneh latihan. Mbusak kabeh bobot sing digawe sadurunge lan log tensorboard.
Enables Voice Activity Detection to only: Ngaktifake Deteksi Aktivitas Swara kanggo mung proses audio nalika sampeyan ngomong, ngirit CPU.
Enables memory-efficient training. This: Ngaktifake latihan sing efisien memori. Iki nyuda panggunaan VRAM kanthi biaya kacepetan latihan sing luwih alon. Iki migunani kanggo GPU kanthi memori winates (kayata, <6GB VRAM) utawa nalika latihan kanthi ukuran kumpulan sing luwih gedhe tinimbang sing bisa diakomodasi GPU sampeyan.
Enabling this setting will result in the: Ngaktifake setelan iki bakal nyebabake file G lan D mung nyimpen versi paling anyar, kanthi efektif ngirit ruang panyimpenan.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific inp: Kanggo driver ASIO, milih saluran input tartamtu. Jarke ing -1 kanggo gawan.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific mon: Kanggo driver ASIO, milih saluran output monitor tartamtu. Jarke ing -1 kanggo gawan.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific out: Kanggo driver ASIO, milih saluran output tartamtu. Jarke ing -1 kanggo gawan.
For WASAPI (Windows), gives the app excl: Kanggo WASAPI (Windows), menehi aplikasi kontrol eksklusif kanggo latensi sing luwih cilik.
Influence exerted by the index file; a h: Pengaruh sing diwenehake dening file indeks; nilai sing luwih dhuwur cocog karo pengaruh sing luwih gedhe. Nanging, milih nilai sing luwih murah bisa mbantu nyuda artefak sing ana ing audio.
It will activate the possibility of disp: Iki bakal ngaktifake kemungkinan nampilake aktivitas Applio saiki ing Discord.
It's advisable to align it with the avai: Disaranake kanggo nyelarasake karo VRAM sing kasedhiya ing GPU sampeyan. Setelan 4 menehi akurasi sing luwih apik nanging pangolahan sing luwih alon, dene 8 menehi asil sing luwih cepet lan standar.
It's recommended keep deactivate this op: Disaranake supaya mateni pilihan iki yen set data sampeyan wis diproses.
It's recommended to deactivate this opti: Disaranake mateni pilihan iki yen set data sampeyan wis diproses.
KMeans is a clustering algorithm that di: KMeans minangka algoritma kluster sing mbagi set data dadi K kluster. Setelan iki utamane migunani kanggo set data gedhe.
Length of the overlap between slices for: Dawa tumpang tindih antarane irisan kanggo metode 'Prasaja'.
Male voice models typically use 155.0 an: Model swara lanang biasane nggunakake 155.0 lan model swara wadon biasane nggunakake 255.0.
Model used for learning speaker embeddin: Model sing digunakake kanggo sinau embedding speaker.
Move files to custom embedder folder: Pindhah file menyang folder embedder kustom
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Algoritma ekstraksi nada sing digunakake kanggo konversi audio. Algoritma gawan yaiku rmvpe, sing disaranake kanggo umume kasus.
Please ensure compliance with the terms: Mangga pesthekake tundhuk karo syarat lan katemtuan sing dirinci ing [dokumen iki](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) sadurunge nerusake inferensi sampeyan.
Mangga priksa manawa sampeyan tundhuk karo syarat lan katemtuan sing rinci ing [dokumen iki](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) sadurunge nerusake realtime sampeyan.
Mangga pesthekake tundhuk karo syarat lan katemtuan sing dirinci ing [dokumen iki](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) sadurunge nerusake latihan sampeyan.
Post-process the audio to apply effects: Pasca-proses audio kanggo ngetrapake efek menyang output.
Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Jaga konsonan sing beda lan swara ambegan kanggo nyegah sobek elektro-akustik lan artefak liyane. Narik parameter menyang nilai maksimal 0,5 menehi perlindungan sing komprehensif. Nanging, nyuda nilai iki bisa nyuda tingkat perlindungan nalika bisa nyuda efek indeksasi.
Select the TTS voice to use for the conv: Pilih swara TTS sing arep digunakake kanggo konversi.
Select the custom pretrained model for t: Pilih model pra-latih kustom kanggo diskriminator.
Pilih model pra-latih kustom kanggo generator.
Select the device for monitoring your vo: Pilih piranti kanggo ngawasi swara sampeyan (umpamane, headphone sampeyan).
Select the device where the final conver: Pilih piranti ing ngendi swara sing diowahi pungkasan bakal dikirim (umpamane, kabel virtual).
Select the folder containing the audios: Pilih folder sing ngemot audio sing arep dikonversi.
Select the folder where the output audio: Pilih folder ing ngendi audio output bakal disimpen.
Select the index file to be exported: Pilih file indeks sing arep diekspor
Select the index file to use for the con: Pilih file indeks sing arep digunakake kanggo konversi.
Select the language you want to use. (Re: Pilih basa sing arep digunakake. (Mbutuhake miwiti ulang Applio)
Select the microphone or audio interface: Pilih mikropon utawa antarmuka audio sing bakal sampeyan gunakake kanggo ngomong.
Select the precision you want to use for: Pilih presisi sing arep digunakake kanggo latihan lan inferensi.
Select the pretrained model you want to: Pilih model pra-latih sing arep diunduh.
Select the pth file to be exported: Pilih file pth sing arep diekspor
Select the speaker ID to use for the con: Pilih ID speaker sing arep digunakake kanggo konversi.
Select the theme you want to use. (Requi: Pilih tema sing arep digunakake. (Mbutuhake miwiti ulang Applio)
Select the voice model to use for the co: Pilih model swara sing arep digunakake kanggo konversi.
Select two voice models, set your desire: Pilih rong model swara, setel persentase campuran sing dikarepake, lan campur dadi swara sing anyar.
Set the autotune strength - the more you: Setel kakuwatan autotune - saya tambah, saya bakal nempel ing kothak kromatik.
Set the clean-up level to the audio you: Setel tingkat reresik audio sing dikarepake, saya tambah, saya resik, nanging bisa uga audio bakal luwih dikompres.
Set the maximum number of epochs you wan: Setel jumlah epoch maksimal sing dikarepake supaya model mandheg latihan yen ora ana paningkatan sing dideteksi.
Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Setel nada audio, saya dhuwur nilaine, saya dhuwur nadane.
Specifies the overall quantity of epochs: Nemtokake jumlah sakabehe epoch kanggo proses latihan model.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Nemtokake jumlah GPU sing arep digunakake kanggo ngekstrak kanthi ngetik lan dipisahake karo tanda hubung (-).
Split the audio into chunks for inferenc: Pecah audio dadi potongan kanggo inferensi supaya entuk asil sing luwih apik ing sawetara kasus.
Substitute or blend with the volume enve: Ganti utawa campur karo amplop volume output. Saya cedhak rasio karo 1, saya akeh amplop output sing digunakake.
The GPU information will be displayed he: Informasi GPU bakal ditampilake ing kene.
The audio file has been successfully add: File audio wis kasil ditambahake menyang set data. Mangga klik tombol pra-proses.
The button 'Upload' is only for google c: Tombol 'Unggah' mung kanggo google colab: Ngunggah file sing diekspor menyang folder ApplioExported ing Google Drive sampeyan.
The f0 curve represents the variations i: Kurva f0 nggambarake variasi frekuensi dhasar swara saka wektu, nuduhake carane nada munggah lan mudhun.
The file you dropped is not a valid pret: File sing sampeyan selehna dudu file pra-latih sing sah. Coba maneh.
The name that will appear in the model i: Jeneng sing bakal katon ing informasi model.
The number of CPU cores to use in the ex: Jumlah inti CPU sing digunakake ing proses ekstraksi. Setelan gawan yaiku inti cpu sampeyan, sing disaranake kanggo umume kasus.
The output information will be displayed: Informasi output bakal ditampilake ing kene.
The path to the text file that contains: Path menyang file teks sing ngemot konten kanggo teks dadi wicara.
The path where the output audio will be: Path ing ngendi audio output bakal disimpen, kanthi gawan ing aset/audio/output.wav
This setting enables you to save the wei: Setelan iki ngidini sampeyan nyimpen bobot model ing pungkasan saben epoch.
Utilize pretrained models when training: Gunakake model pra-latih nalika nglatih model sampeyan dhewe. Pendekatan iki nyuda durasi latihan lan nambah kualitas sakabehe.
Utilizing custom pretrained models can l: Nggunakake model pra-latih kustom bisa ngasilake asil sing unggul, amarga milih model pra-latih sing paling cocog karo kasus panggunaan tartamtu bisa nambah kinerja kanthi signifikan.
Volume level below which audio is treate: Tingkat volume ing ngendi audio dianggep sepi lan ora diproses. Mbantu ngirit sumber daya CPU lan nyuda swara latar mburi.
Sampeyan uga bisa nggunakake path kustom.
